argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | equs45f.1 | |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sb6f--i | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_equs45f--i | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
\
 Equivalence for substitution when ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by NM, 18-May-2008.)
